Control Name: AUDIT REVIEW, ANALYSIS, AND REPORTING | PROCESS INTEGRATION
Control Statement: The organization employs automated mechanisms to integrate audit review, analysis, and reporting processes to support organizational processes for investigation and response to suspicious activities.Supplemental Guidance:  Organizational processes benefiting from integrated audit review, analysis, and reporting include, for example, incident response, continuous monitoring, contingency planning, and Inspector General audits. Related controls: AU-12, PM-7.
